members.member: NewNLPair return a new NfaPair that matches a new line (\r\n?|\n)

member.name: F:Lex.Gen.tokens
member.summary: Hashtable that maps characters to their corresponding lexical code for the internal lexical analyzer.

member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.CsLex.CsLexTaskStub
member.summary:
This complies with the ProxyToSolutionCompiledTask calling convention.
Expected parameters (task items with metadata ParameterName equal to these): • Inputs, multiple input files to process. Metadata: • • FullPath — full path to the input file. • • OutputFile — full path to the output file. • • References — a collection of paths (like an item group substitution, i.e. semicolon-separated) for resolving “%include”s given just as file names. • DontCache — do not use distributed cache, if present. • DistributedCacheSettings — allows to turn on network upload.
